# NWBrowser.Descriptor.bonjourWithTXTRecord(type:domain:)

**Case**

A service descriptor used to discover a Bonjour service with associated TXT records.

## Declaration

```swift
case bonjourWithTXTRecord(type: String, domain: String?)
```

## Descriptor Types

- **NWBrowser.Descriptor.bonjour(type:domain:)**: A service descriptor used to discover a Bonjour service.
